pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Multistate Life Table (MSLT) Methodology Based on Bayesian Approach // Create life tables with a Bayesian approach, which can be very useful for modelling a complex health process when considering multiple predisposing factors and multiple coexisting health conditions. Details for this method can be found in: Zang, Emma, et al., (2022) doi:10.1093/geronb/gbab149.
